mapper.update: UPDATE qft_focus_housing h SET h.is_delete = 1 WHERE h.id = #{id};
mapper.select: SELECT h.creater_id createrId, h.create_time createTime, h.creater_name createrName, h.updater_id updaterId, h.update_time updateTime, h.company_id companyId, h.focus_type focusType, h.store_id storeId, h.store_name storeName h.group_id groupId, h.house_code houseCode, h.house_area houseArea, h.property_adrr propertyAdrr, h.building, h.developers, h.developers_call developersCall, h.developers_other_call developersOtherCall, h.transfer_accounts transferAccounts, h.account_number accountNumber, h.transfer_bank transferBank, h.floor, h.is_lift isLift, h.room_count roomCount, h.house_note houseNote, t.id trustId, t.hosting_create_time hostingCreateTime, t.hosting_end_time hostingEndTime, t.contract_year contractYear, t.contract_month contractMonth, t.contract_day contractDay, t.add_appoint addAppoint, t.add_type addType, t.add_money addMoney, t.joe_price joePrice, t.deposit_money depositMoney, t.payment_method paymentMethod, t.vacancy_year vacancyYear, t.vacancy_month vacancyMonth, t.vacamcy_day vacamcyDay, t.salesman_id salesmanId, t.before_time beforeTime, t.postpone_time postponeTime FROM qft_focus_housing h, qft_focus_trust t WHERE h.is_delete = 0 AND h.id = t.housing_id AND h.id = #{id}
